column5: Looks like today plus 21 days and we will be fishing.
Great to hear that's a start! Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
outdoor gatherings up to 10 people ? Its going to be awhile folks !
My group is way under 10,so I think we are good to go
Your group could be 1 and you are not going to get in. There talking about letting citizens get haircuts in July they are not even close to opening the border!
Oh I'm in ,probably sept or oct
I dont know if v-bay gord can go that long ? He's probably starting to look like Leon Russell ?
Lol if he looks like Leon Russell I don't think I want to see him
Haircuts and "outdoor sports" could both happen as early as July 2. Just sayin'...
Toronto Bluejays were extended from July 1 to July 21 to continue playing home games in Buffalo. NY.
